description: --- license: cc-by-nc-4.0 pipeline_tag: text-to-speech library_name: f5-tts datasets: - amphion/Emilia-Dataset --- Download F5-TTS or E2 TTS and place under ckpts/ Github: Paper: F5-TTS: A Fairytaler that Fakes Fluent and Faithful Speech with Flow Matching
